text: Lelo iwele halaal kukwenu (kulya) yambone (yosope), niyakulya ya awala wawapedwile Chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) iwele halaal kukwenu, nombe yakulya yenu iwele halaal kukwao, ni (nkundisyidwe soni kwalomba) achakongwe wambone mu wakulupilila (wachisilamu) kwisa soni achakongwe wambone mwa awala wanakupedwaga Chitabu paujo penu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) naga n'di mwapele mahari gao (mbiya syandowa kapena chilichose chakwalombelela), mwakwalomba ngawaga mwachikululu kapena kwatenda maganja, sano jwatakane chikulupi, nikuti pamasile pagajonasiche masengo gakwe, soni jwalakwejo ku Akhera tachiwa mu wakwasika
